title: URL Parameters as Object
description: In this lab, we will explore how to extract and map URL parameters into a JavaScript object using regular expressions and array methods. We will learn how to use String.prototype.match() to obtain all key-value pairs and Array.prototype.reduce() to transform them into a single object. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to work with URLs and extract useful information from them.

meta.title: Extracting URL Parameters as JavaScript Objects
meta.description: Learn how to use regular expressions and array methods to extract and map URL parameters into a JavaScript object.
meta.keywords: URL parameters, JavaScript object, regular expressions, array methods, web development

verify.name: Verify Student's Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
